channel.title: Please HelP!
channel.description: Okay this doesn't relate to a server project, but it relates to the Status page, on most server posts i see everyone has working GIFs, i was wondering how do i post gifs like that? I have the link from photobucket but when i post it nothing comes up?

item.title: Please HelP!
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Put it as [ img ] [ / img ] but if you uploaded as a video then it won’t work. You can convert to gif using camtasia studios.

Read full topic
